configurations.name: Shell: Run Examples (prompt)
runtimeArgs: cd "${workspaceFolder}" && find . -name "*.java" > sources.txt && javac -cp "lib/tester.jar:lib/javalib.jar" -d out @sources.txt && echo '--- RUN OUTPUT ---' && java -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp out:lib/tester.jar:lib/javalib.jar tester.Main ${input:examplesClass}

configurations.name: Shell: Run Current Java (auto)
runtimeArgs: cd "${workspaceFolder}" && file="${file}" && if [ -z "$file" ]; then echo 'No active file open'; exit 1; fi; cls=$(.vscode/get_java_class.sh "$file") && find . -name "*.java" > sources.txt && javac -cp "lib/tester.jar:lib/javalib.jar" -d out @sources.txt && echo '--- RUN OUTPUT ---' && java -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp out:lib/tester.jar:lib/javalib.jar tester.Main "$cls"

configurations.name: Shell: Run All Examples In Current File
runtimeArgs: cd "${workspaceFolder}" && file="${file}" && if [ -z "$file" ]; then echo 'No active file open'; exit 1; fi; ./.vscode/run_all_examples.sh "$file"

inputs.description: Enter Examples class for tester (e.g. Week_2.Book.ExamplesBooks)
